text: Sylvain Rochon is a Canadian politician, who was elected to the National Assembly of Quebec in a by-election on March 9, 2015."PQ clings to Richelieu as CAQ vote continues to grow; Liberals place third". Montreal Gazette, March 9, 2015. He represented the electoral district of Richelieu as a member of the Parti Québécois until 2018. Prior to his election to the legislature, Rochon worked as a journalist for local radio station CJSO-FM, and as a political assistant to both Élaine Zakaïb, his predecessor as MNA for Richelieu, and Zakaïb's predecessor Sylvain Simard."Sylvain Rochon sera candidat à l'investiture du Parti Québécois Richelieu". Sorel-Tracy Magazine, October 13, 2014. ==Electoral record== ==References== Category:Living people Category:Parti Québécois MNAs Category:Canadian radio journalists Category:French Quebecers Category:21st-century Canadian politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sylvain Rochon
